item.description:
"THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE AND ACTIVITIES ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND,."

SATURDAY, JANUARY 8, at the new Holiday Inn Grand Ballroom,
4 Highwood Dr., Tewksbury. Rte. 133 off Rte. 93. (978)640-9000.
www.se-4u.com.
Dancing with music by Award-winning DJ from 8:30-12AM.
Complimentary hors dâ€™oeuvres, raffles, free door prizes, and MATCH GAME prizes.
FREE SALSA DANCE LESSONS, 7:30-8:30.
HUNDREDS OF SINGLES, 35-65 years old.
Cost is $13.
Proper business dress is required for men; sports jacket or dress shirt & tie at minimum; business or party finery for women.
Co-sponsored by the Young Professionals Club.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Pam at the door.
item.name: "SINGLES WITH STYLE" SINGLES DANCE
